entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incremental source generator hint name issue #57991
  • why can't the source generator be used in the net6.0? #57990
  • Crash while editing Syntax.xml #57987

PullRequests

Created

  • Change nullable annotation on CopyAnnotationsTo() #57992
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix placement of trivia inside an interpolation #57989
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify creation of interpolation text tokens. #57988
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57984
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main into features/rawstringliterals #57981
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57986
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update OneOffInsertion.ps1 file path #57985
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify 'interpolation' data, and move to an easier to consume System.Range approach for it #57966
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Read SourceLink info and call service to retrieve source from there #57978
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Use runtime type arguments for lsp jsonrpc request handling #57834
    Area-IDE
